title: Topic 001 Question 183
body: You have a Power BI report that contains a single page. The page contains two line charts and one bar chart.
You need to ensure that users can perform the following tasks for all three visuals:
•	Switch the measures used in the visuals.
The solution must minimize development effort.
options: Create a bookmark for each acceptable combination of visual type, measure, and legend in the bar chart.
Edit the interactions between the three visuals.
